trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento de <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonClick" /> .

trans-unit.source: The event occurs whenever the user clicks on a button on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control.
trans-unit.target: O evento ocorre sempre que o usuário clica em um botão em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.Button%2A> property contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> wiith the information about the button that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.Button%2A> propriedade contém o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> wiith as informações sobre o botão foi clicado.

trans-unit.source: The following example instantiates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> and three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> e três <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> controles.

trans-unit.source: The toolbar buttons are assigned to the button collection, the collection is assigned to the toolbar, and the toolbar is added to the form.
trans-unit.target: Os botões da barra de ferramentas são atribuídos à coleção de botão, a coleção é atribuída à barra de ferramentas e barra de ferramentas é adicionada ao formulário.

trans-unit.source: On the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonClick> event of the toolbar, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.Button%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs> is evaluated, and the appropriate dialog opened.
trans-unit.target: No <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonClick> eventos da barra de ferramentas, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.Button%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs> é avaliada, e abrir a caixa de diálogo apropriada.

trans-unit.source: This code assumes that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SaveFileDialog>, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> have been instantiated.
trans-unit.target: Esse código supõe que um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog>, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SaveFileDialog>e um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> foram criadas.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.Button%2A> property is set equal to the `button` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.Button%2A> propriedade será definida como o `button` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> que recebeu um clique.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.Button%2A> property is initially set equal to the `button` parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.Button%2A> propriedade é inicialmente definida como o `button` parâmetro do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: The following example instantiates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> and three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> e três <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> controles.

trans-unit.source: The toolbar buttons are assigned to the button collection, the collection is assigned to the toolbar, and the toolbar is added to the form.
trans-unit.target: Os botões da barra de ferramentas são atribuídos à coleção de botão, a coleção é atribuída à barra de ferramentas e barra de ferramentas é adicionada ao formulário.

trans-unit.source: On the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonClick> event of the toolbar, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.Button%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs> is evaluated, and the appropriate dialog opened.
trans-unit.target: No <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonClick> eventos da barra de ferramentas, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.Button%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs> é avaliada, e abrir a caixa de diálogo apropriada.

trans-unit.source: This code assumes that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SaveFileDialog>, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> have been instantiated.
trans-unit.target: Esse código supõe que um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog>, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SaveFileDialog>e um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> foram criadas.
